chart.name: Top Containers by CPU %
chart.programText:
A = data('cpu.usage.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('cpu.usage.system', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A/B * 100).mean(over='15s').sum(by=['plugin_instance']).top(count=10).publish(label='C')

chart.name: CPU %
chart.programText:
A = data('cpu.usage.system').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('cpu.usage.total').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*B/A).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (C).min().publish(label='D')
E = (C).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='E')
F = (C).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='F')
G = (C).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='G')
H = (C).max().publish(label='H')

chart.description: Memory utilization of containers as % of limit
chart.name: Memory % by Container
chart.programText:
A = data('memory.usage.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('memory.usage.limit', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((100*A)/B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Memory utilization of containers as % of limit
chart.name: Memory %
chart.programText:
A = data('memory.usage.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('memory.usage.limit', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((100*A)/B).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Memory Used %
chart.programText:
A = data('memory.usage.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('memory.usage.limit', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*A/B).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (C).min().publish(label='D')
E = (C).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='E')
F = (C).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='F')
G = (C).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='G')
H = (C).max().publish(label='H')

chart.name: CPU %
chart.programText:
A = data('cpu.usage.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('cpu.usage.system', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((A/B)*100).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Evolution of the number of running containers
chart.name: Containers
Total Network Bits/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('network.usage.tx_bytes', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).sum().scale(8).publish(label='A')
B = data('network.usage.rx_bytes', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).sum().scale(8).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Host Memory %
chart.programText:
A = data('memory.free', filter=filter('plugin', 'memory')).publish(label='A')
B = data('memory.cached', filter=filter('plugin', 'memory')).publish(label='B')
C = data('memory.buffered', filter=filter('plugin', 'memory')).publish(label='C')
D = data('memory.used', filter=filter('plugin', 'memory')).publish(label='D')

chart.name: Containers CPU %
chart.programText:
A = data('cpu.usage.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('cpu.usage.system', filter=filter('plugin', 'docker')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((A/B)*100).publish(label='C')
